item.title: Ffmpeg Bash Script
item.description: Using Ffmpeg is very effective way to convert video files for Youtube and Davinci Resolve. If you want to convert more than one video files a Bash script is very useful. Let’s create a converting script I am not a programmer but some times I need to create some scripts. So the script which we will create can be different that we create. item.title: Ffmpeg for Davinci Users
item.description: Ffmpeg is one of the most amazing tool in Linux. Most of the time, I use it for converting video files for Davinci Resolve. But why I am converting files, let’s take a look at it. Unfotunately Linux version of Davinci Resolve does not support mpeg4 or H264 files for video editing. So we have to convert these kind of files to DNXHD or PRORES. First of all we should install ffmpeg;
